name: INSetSeatSettingsInCarIntent
desc: A request to change the seat-related settings in a CarPlay-enabled vehicle.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init(enableHeating: Bool?, enableCooling: Bool?, enableMassage: Bool?, seat: INCarSeat, level: Int?, relativeLevel: INRelativeSetting, carName: INSpeakableString?)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with the specified climate settings information.

items.name: var seat: INCarSeat
items.desc: The seat position whose settings you want to modify.

items.name: var enableCooling: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to enable the seat cooling system.

items.name: var enableHeating: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to enable the seat heating system.

items.name: var enableMassage: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to enable the seat massage system.

items.name: var level: Int?
items.desc: An integer value indicating the desired level for the seat setting.

items.name: var relativeLevelSetting: INRelativeSetting
items.desc: A relative change to the level value.

items.name: var carName: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: The name of the car you applied the settings to.
